/**
 * @module js/derivedContextService
 */ /**
 * Return type that must be used when getting derived states
 *
 * @param {Object} param0 DerivedStateResult input
 * @param {[String]} param0.ctxParameters A string list of ctx dependencies. For example ["flagA"] indicates a dependency on "ctx.flagA"
 * @param {[Any]} param0.additionalParameters A list of additional parameters to include in the compute function. These will be passed directly to the compute function.
 * @param {[String]} param0.compute The compute function which will be called with the renderContext and any additionalParameters to get the latest result
 */export const DerivedStateResult=function(_ref){let{ctxParameters,additionalParameters,compute}=_ref;if(!compute){throw new Error('DerivedStateResult must have a compute function');}this.ctxParameters=ctxParameters||[];this.additionalParameters=additionalParameters||[];this.compute=compute;};
